name: Guiding Light (itch) (Medve)
description:
You are trapped in an archipelago by a mysterious force. Use your Battle Lighthouse and your boat to gather resources and find a way out through a mirror dimension!

This is the entry of the Wave Riders team to the 2022 Epic Mega Jam. Enjoy!

Made by Maróti Zoltán, Ádám Dávid and Barabás Péter
